meta.description: Herohero is a social network that appreciates creativity.
meta.title: About # Herohero

home.mainHeader:
Herohero is
 a social network
 that appreciates creativity.

secondSection.header: Are you a creator or a fan? Why not both!
secondSection.description: We believe that every creative person respects other people's work as well. That's why herohero doesn't divide users between creators and fans.

thirdSection.header: Creative work takes time. Time is not free.
thirdSection.description: Let your fans subscribe to you directly and build a regular income from your creative work.

fourthSection.header: It doesn't matter who you are or what you do.
fourthSection.description: Hundreds of people start their herohero accounts every day. Just do whatever feels like you.

fifthSection.header: Create freely. Enjoy content without distractions.
fifthSection.description: You probably don't want your fans to be distracted by other content. That's why we provide an intimate and noise-free platform without intrusive suggestions, ads, and even likes.

post.header: California's nature and wildlife is hugely diverse with great wilderness areas.

2.name: Natalia Sharma
2.text: Can you tell us where is  this located exactly? Would love to explore this area too.

seventhSection.header: Build your community. Earn from subscriptions.
seventhSection.description: To subscribe to someone on herohero means to be truly interested in their creative work. Why not seize the opportunity?

eightSection.howDoIStartAnswer: Getting started with herohero is very easy. All you have to do is sign in (you can do that via Google or Facebook), connect your card to Stripe (so we can send you your money), and start creating. There is no catch, it really is that simple.
eightSection.howGetPaidAnswer: TThe creators earn money from their fans via monthly subscriptions. We send money to the creators' bank accounts on the first business day of each month. The security of all transactions is ensured by Stripe.
eightSection.whatAreTheFeesAnswer: Herohero keeps 10% of your earnings. This fee already includes everything, from payment gateway and transferring fees to audio and video hosting. You will not pay anything extra.
eightSection.areThereRestrictionsAnswer: We don't wish to limit your creativity. Everyone can upload an unlimited number of videos, audio, images and text. As for restrictions on topics - do whatever you like, as long as your content complies with Czech law.
